rows.THE SIX PROGRAMS: Every activity in the company falls under one of six programs.

rows.col_3: Get new customers into the funnel
rows.col_4: VSL Production, Hook Testing, Ad Scaling, Content Production, Influencer Outreach, UGC Pipeline
Landing Page Optimization, Checkout Flow, Offer Stack Testing, Pricing Strategy, A/B Testing
Email Sequences, Subscription Program, Loyalty Mechanics, Replenishment, Winback, Churn Prevention

rows.col_3: Make the product excellent and evolving
rows.col_4: Quality Control, New SKU Development, Packaging, Supplier Management, Formulation Iteration
Fulfillment, Shipping, Customer Support, Inventory, Vendor Management, Legal Compliance
rows.col_5: Ship Time + Support CSAT + Stockout Rate
rows.col_6: Every 12 weeks: ops audit + process improvement

rows.col_3: Know the numbers, stay alive, grow
rows.col_4: P&L Management, Cash Flow, Unit Economics, Forecasting, Fundraising Prep, Tax/Compliance

rows.THE SIX PROGRAMS: RETENTION feeds ACQUISITION (referrals, testimonials, LTV funds more spend)
PRODUCT feeds CONVERSION + RETENTION (better product = better conversion + retention)
OPERATIONS enables everything (if shipping breaks, nothing else matters)
FINANCE measures everything (if you're out of money, nothing else matters)
The virtuous cycle: Acquisition → Conversion → Retention → (funds more) Acquisition
The support structure: Product + Operations + Finance enable the cycle
